newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIA OTC MARKET VOLUME SLIDES.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIA OTC MARKET VOLUME SLIDES.

text.p: Volumes and turnover on Romania's over-the-counter (OTC) market fell on Thursday, according to data issued by the market's RASDAQ trading system.
Volume was slightly lower at 2.9 million shares on turnover of 10.4 billion lei -- or some 4 billion lower on the previous trading session.
Cement maker Casial was the top performer, trading more than 600,000 shares and closing flat at 1,300.
Traders expected subdued activity on Friday, ahead of the Orthodox Easter at the end of the week.
